# tf.sysconfig.get_lib

Get the directory containing the TensorFlow framework library.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/sysconfig/get_lib"><code>tf.compat.v1.sysconfig.get_lib</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/sysconfig/get_lib"><code>tf.compat.v2.sysconfig.get_lib</code></a>


``` python
tf.sysconfig.get_lib()
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Returns:

The directory as string.
